scripts.test: echo '=> running tests' && ./node_modules/.bin/jasmine-node spec && echo '=> tests passed'
scripts.minify:js: echo '=> minify:js' && uglifyjs ./*.js -o ./dist/js/app.min.js --source-map ./dist/js/app.js.map && echo '=> minify:js completed'
